## kl list clusters

list all the clusters accessible to you

### Synopsis

```
List Clusters

This command will help you to see list of all the clusters that's accessible to you. 

Examples:
  # list clusters accessible to you
  kl list clusters

```

  -h, --help   help for clusters
  -h, --help   help for clusters
